Wildland Trekker.Elite 2: Battle skill Tempestuous Arc improved: Triggering the additional effect 3 time(s) grants the team Electric DMG Dealt +0.08% for every point of Arclight's Intellect. This effect has a 15s duration and cannot stack.

Hannabit Wisdom.Elite 3: 50% chance to ignore an Arts Infliction applied on her.

Blade of the Wildlands.Elite 3: Assign to Manufacturing Cabin to grant weapon EXP material production efficiency +20%
